formula: Using the formula in A000030: a(n) = [n^n / 10^([log_10(n^n)])] = [n^n / 10^([n*log_10(n)])].
mathematica: a = {}; Do[ a = Append[ a, IntegerDigits[ n^n ] [ [ 1 ] ] ], {n, 1, 75 } ]; a
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 06 2001
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, May 10 2001
Further terms from Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), May 20 2001
